channel.title: How do you change the text when you log in?
channel.description: [b]When you log into a server, it has text, such as "Welcome to Rockscape" or something like that. How do you change all of that? If you can help please post, or if you have a link for a tutorial, please put it here. :D[/b]

item.title: How do you change the text when you log in?
item.dc:creator: @Ensar Ensar
item.description:
@Ensar wrote:

I don’t know any good ones.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you change the text when you log in?
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

[b]It keeps sayign this when I try to compile my server:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: AnimHandler/java
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: AnimHandler.java
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320)
Could not find the main class: AnimHandler.java. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

I went to my Java Bin and everything I had to do, and it still didn’t work. Help me please.[/b]

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the text when you log in?

item.description:
@shockys wrote:

you have too COMPILE IT.
then restart your sever,
and there you go.

item.title: How do you change the text when you log in?
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“gunz4life, post:21, topic:291539”][quote author=Ensar link=topic=385259.msg2889595#msg2889595 date=1248814635]
It says ::::::::::::::::::::::
:Server Compiling…::
::::::::::::::::::::::
client.java:13232: cannot find symbol
symbol : method yell(java.lang.String)
location: class client
yell(“username has Logged in.”);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
:::::::::::::::::::
:Server Compiled!::
:::::::::::::::::::
Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]
Search that error, and delete maybe :eek: :eek:[/quote]Wow you fail…

yell(""+playerName+" has logged in!");

item.title: How do you change the text when you log in?
item.dc:creator: @shockys shockys
item.description:
@shockys wrote:

when you change anything, you have too COMPILE it.
right click on compiler.bat > edit > delete everything in it > paste this.

@echo off COLOR 09 title shockys V1 Compiler, Created By shockys echo::::::::::::::::::::::: echo::Server Compiling...:: echo::::::::::::::::::::::: javac *.java Color 2 echo:::::::::::::::::::: echo::Server Compiled!:: echo:::::::::::::::::::: pause

exit out, save it. then compile again, and it should work.
(:

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the text when you log in?

item.title: How do you change the text when you log in?
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“Ensar, post:14, topic:291539”]It still doesn’t work. It keeps saying “Welcome to Project Rampage”

And I can’t change the commands.[/quote]
Compile maybe??

@echo off
javac *.java
pause

there, that uses any java version you got :eek:

item.title: How do you change the text when you log in?
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“shockys, post:10, topic:291539”]open client.java
press CTRL + F
and search

 welcome to rockscape

then change the ROCKSCAPE too where ever you’d like.[/quote]

adding on to that…

if you want to make a new “message”
do this

sM("welcome to rockscape!");

or…

sendMessage("welcome to rockscape!");[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2009, 02:32:46 pm[/size][hr]but you can’t do a whole paragraph on one “sM” you have to make a new one after a sentence or so.

Read full topic
